title: Goldman-Backed Brazil Data Center Explores Power Supply Options
description: Brazil’s biggest utility is exploring options to guarantee the power supply for a $50 billion data center project aimed at putting Rio de Janeiro at the forefront of artificial intelligence in Latin America.
content: (Bloomberg) Brazils biggest utility is exploring options to guarantee the power supply for a $50 billion data center project aimed at putting Rio de Janeiro at the forefront of artificial intelligenc… [+3539 chars]
